storage
Interface Storage

All Known Implementing Classes:
StorageServer
public interface Storage

Storage server client interface.

All methods in this interface may raise NullPointerException if passed null for arguments or SecurityException if the security manager on the server does not allow an operation.

Method Summary
 byte[] read(Path file, long offset, int length)
          Reads a sequence of bytes from a file.
 long size(Path file)
          Returns the length of a file, in bytes.
 void write(Path file, long offset, byte[] data)
          Writes bytes to a file.
 

Method Detail

size

long size(Path file)
          throws RMIException,
                 FileNotFoundException
Returns the length of a file, in bytes.

Parameters:
file - Path to the file.
Returns:
The length of the file.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If the file cannot be found or the path refers to a directory.
RMIException - If the call cannot be completed due to a network error.

read

byte[] read(Path file,
            long offset,
            int length)
            throws RMIException,
                   FileNotFoundException,
                   IOException
Reads a sequence of bytes from a file.

Parameters:
file - Path to the file.
offset - Offset into the file to the beginning of the sequence.
length - The number of bytes to be read.
Returns:
An array containing the bytes read. If the call succeeds, the number of bytes read is equal to the number of bytes requested.
Throws:
IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the sequence specified by offset and length is outside the bounds of the file, or if length is negative.
FileNotFoundException - If the file cannot be found or the path refers to a directory.
IOException - If the file read cannot be completed on the server.
RMIException - If the call cannot be completed due to a network error.

write

void write(Path file,
           long offset,
           byte[] data)
           throws RMIException,
                  FileNotFoundException,
                  IOException
Writes bytes to a file.

Parameters:
file - Path to the file.
offset - Offset into the file where data is to be written.
data - Array of bytes to be written.
Throws:
IndexOutOfBoundsException - If offset is negative.
FileNotFoundException - If the file cannot be found or the path refers to a directory.
IOException - If the file write cannot be completed on the server.
RMIException - If the call cannot be completed due to a network error.
